title: Our First Photo
caption: The day the world became more beautiful. I knew from that moment :)

title: First Valentine's Day
caption: The first of many unique bouquets for the most special girl in the world.

title: First Halloween
caption: That night, I saw the most beautiful thing in the world, your sparkling eyes. I will always cherish that night, spending your favorite holiday together for the first time :)

title: Rainbow Springs State Park
caption: Sun, the clear waters, and you, sounds like a perfect day to me :)

title: Canada Together
caption: Thank you for coming across the border with your parents just to see me before the long summer break :)

title: The Weeknd's Concert in Jersey
caption: I really do love everything about you, so much that your favorite artist is my second favorite now (you are first)!

title: Your Graduation
caption: I remember watching your speech as Senior Class President like it was yesterday! Thank you for the shoutout :)

title: Our First Birthday Together
caption: Thank you for making it my favorite birthday out of all 19 :)

title: FBLA Win Together
caption: The best gift was having you there alongside me, thank you for being my biggest fan :)

title: Dinner Dates with You
caption: My favorite dinners are dinner dates anywhere with you. I can't wait for our next trip to Mayday's!

title: Studying Together
caption: Thank you for helping me feel less stressed about all of my tests and exams!

title: Hamilton on Broadway
caption: You, me, and your favorite musical. I like your version of the musical better! Your voice is so beautiful to me :)
